Posts.Content: Hi , I am 38 and i found a big lump in my breast, did mamo and ultrasound, the dr cam and showed me that it has irregular shape and its solid thats why its suspecious and they did a biopsy. My question is that is this possible to have an irregular solid mass but still benign result?? please let mw know i a preparing myself for the worst case
Posts.Title: breast lump irregular shape
